item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, January 27, 2025 at 6:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Openhaystack: Build 'AirTags' – track Bluetooth devices via Apple's network (146 points | 25 comments)
2. Lessons in creating family photos that people want to keep (2018) (130 points | 36 comments)
3. Show HN: Bagels – TUI expense tracker (46 points | 8 comments)
4. Using generative AI as part of historical research: three case studies (175 points | 146 comments)
5. Wikenigma – An Encyclopedia of Unknowns (11 points | 1 comment)
6. Shunpo: Minimalist bash tool to make directory navigation a little bit faster (55 points | 17 comments)
7. Marginalia – A search engine that prioritizes non-commercial content (272 points | 24 comments)
8. Show HN: 3D printing giant things with a Python jigsaw generator (83 points | 14 comments)
9. The protester's guide to smartphone security (360 points | 180 comments)
10. Qwen2.5-1M: Deploy your own Qwen with context length up to 1M tokens (169 points | 66 comments)
11. Purelymail: Cheap, no-nonsense email (186 points | 101 comments)
12. Interview with Andy Yen, CEO of Proton VPN (37 points | 18 comments)
13. If OpenSSL were a GUI (2022) (95 points | 35 comments)
14. Using the most unhinged AVX-512 instruction to make fastest phrase search algo (140 points | 34 comments)
15. EV maker Canoo, once worth $2.4B, files for bankruptcy (27 points | 20 comments)
16. Kansas tuberculosis outbreak is America's largest recorded since the 1950s (339 points | 251 comments)
17. OpenJazz is a free, open-source version of the classic Jazz Jackrabbit games (73 points | 9 comments)
18. Amsterdam Compiler Kit for Cray X-MP (62 points | 8 comments)
19. So you wanna write Kubernetes controllers? (125 points | 69 comments)
20. Dualities in functional programming (39 points | 6 comments)
21. Hyperbound (YC S23) is hiring a Founding Account Executive in SF ( | hide)
22. Astronomers delete asteroid because it turned out to be Tesla Roadster (194 points | 62 comments)
23. Autodesk partially restores old forum posts after outcry from the users (50 points | 5 comments)
24. No one is disrupting banks – at least not the big ones (120 points | 194 comments)
25. Show HN: DeepSeek My User Agent (254 points | 100 comments)
26. Show HN: A new native app for 20 year old OS X (104 points | 20 comments)
27. The Microsoft 365 Copilot launch was a disaster (379 points | 367 comments)
28. Show HN: An innovative flag-guessing game that identify regions by fragments (5 points | 6 comments)
29. Hard numbers in the Wayland vs. X11 input latency discussion (407 points | 280 comments)
30. Reviving a Dead Audio Format: The Return of ZZM (87 points | 5 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, January 27, 2025 at 6:20 AM UTC
